website_summaries.verdict: This adorable sleep soother not only works well as a sound machine, but also doubles as a cuddly companion. A quality item that's worth paying a little extra for.
pros: Features four soothing nature sounds with adjustable volume
Auto-off timer can be set to 25 or 45 minutes
Velcro strap and compact size are great for on the go use
In the unlikely event that your baby doesn't enjoy the sound feature, it can be used as a regular stuffed animal
cons: Light sleepers may wake up when the timer goes off

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: I know. It’s 2 am and you’re tired and desperate to get your baby to sleep. Will this work? Maybe. For my 3 month old, it helped!! He loves the river water sound and it helps him fall asleep faster. Helps to drown out noise too. The other sounds have been helpful when we want to distract him in car rides. The only thing I wish is that there is an option to leave sound on constantly (vs 25 or 45 mins). Some of my friends told me their babies didn’t respond to this- but I say give it a try!!! You’ll never know unless you try. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Have Changed
customer_reviews.text: We tried replacing our original Sleep Sheep On-the-Go with this one, but our favorite "whale" sound has changed. The video demonstrates the differences in the whale sounds, comparing the 2020 model with one purchased around 2009.
customer_reviews.author: LT Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I washed the lamb (which washes and dries great) and my daughter locked eyes with it and fell in love..
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought this for my daughter to use as a sound machine when we aren't at home. I washed the lamb (which washes and dries great) and my daughter locked eyes with it and fell in love .... without the sound machine. So I just spent a whole bunch of money on just a stuffed animal, lol! She loves to chew on the velcro tabs on the back which hold the sound machine in. Maybe one day we will use it for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: There is NO way to get battery pack even half way in. Sheep should be large enough for battery pack or battery pack small enough to fit! Returning promptly
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought three of these. One was for the new baby boy of a former employee. She told me her husband said THANK YOU since it really helped the baby to sleep longer. I bought one for me because it is that good. Finally, I just bought this for a new baby boy of my business partner's daughter. It is a Christmas gift so no feedback yet but I think it will be well received.
customer_reviews.author: Piaget

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: My boys were born in 2012, we had 2 of the larger Sleep Sheep, one for each boy. Over time both of the sound boxes quit working. So we just stopped using a white noise machine. Recently, my almost 5 year old has started having pretty bad night terrors. Since he always slept well ( me too over the monitor) I ordered another just for the sound box as there is no replacement for just that part. The whale sound is not the same, none of the sounds are. I am very disappointed. I really thought if he had the same sound that he slept so well to in the past it would help him now. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: LLcoolJ

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made for my son. This is my second one. I bought one when my son was a few months old to help him. As he got older, it has helped him fall asleep. He’s is now almost 10 and I had to purchase another one. The first some stopped working for some reason after 9 1/2 years. Even after replacing the batteries, I couldn’t get it to work. I was so happy to find that amazon carried it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: One child use only
customer_reviews.text: Was fine but won't stand the test of time. Went to replace the batteries because I'm expecting and won't turn on, so it will have been used for just one child. Too bad, wasn't that cheap. Maybe because I bought it from a third party seller (unknowingly)? Maybe it's not even the real thing. I'd go for a name-brand sound machine instead - we have a portable one we like much better that still works 3 years later.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a portable sound soother, this is the one! It is cute and cuddly and has four different options for sounds. The volume control is good. The velcro is very sturdy--attaches easily and stays in place. A wonderful gift for a family constantly on the go with their little one. My only slight complaint is that the batteries drain quickly (even with minimal use), but that would not deter me from purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Too big to be "on-the-go"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Cloud b Sleep Sheep On The Go Travel Sound Soother. It was much bigger than I expected it would be for something labeled as "on-the-go." I'm pretty sure it's the same size as the regular Sleep Sheep but with less sound options. I can't believe it says this can easily fit into a diaper bag because, yeah, it could if you have half of your diaper bag (or more) to give up. I also absolutely would not want this hanging on my stroller; again, it's huge! I didn't even open the packaging once I saw the size so I don't know what the sounds are like.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!! Sound turns OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this little sheep sound machine we liked it so much for our older daughter who has the bigger version that I bought this smaller one for my infant's room but the only reason I'm giving it a low score is the volume goes in and out constantly!! This started about 3 weeks after we got and we put good batteries in it no off brand ones or anything and I turn it on the 45 minute play non-stop and I swear before I've even left the room it goes out! I have to fiddling with the nob to get the sound back on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loved her sleep sheep!! We went home from the hospital listening to the whale sounds and heard that sound for the next 2 years while we napped on the go. This got us through multiple hibachi birthday dinners if that tells you how well it works. We gift this sleepy sheepy every chance we can. Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Andie Falk

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old grandson and it's a hit. It was easy to get started once it was out of the box. Wonderful soft lamb and sounds. I highly recommend this for your new born.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly - Spotsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting baby to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my "go to" baby gift for several years. I always get good feedback from the new parents. I prefer this one over the bigger size as you can use the Velcro straps to attach it to the car seat, swing, bassinet, etc. I like that it has a timer also. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this noise maker. I use it all the time for my 1 year old. I have had it about 6 months and it’s still working. It helped make car rides and nap time easier. I even bought one for my sister in law for her new baby and an extra one for myself. Over all really great quality and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Like to idea but...
customer_reviews.text: First, it’s just a stuffed lamb with a sound machine you place inside it, it’s very hard and shouldn’t be by babies face. The strap to secure it to the car seat or stroller is way too long. You must use the timer setting and every time it goes off, my baby wakes up. The noise sounds are easy to press, as I put the car seat in and out of the car, I accidentally press the whale sound that wakes the baby’s also. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Drea Toler

customer_reviews.title: So cute and works great.
customer_reviews.text: We got this little guy to replace our Cloud B giraffe that someone gave us as a hand me down gift for our daughter. She loved the giraffe and got used to sleeping with it but the battery compartment wore out and needed replacing. This sheep has almost the same sounds and she loves it. She plays with the buttons and falls asleep every night to any of the four options.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only suggestion I have for the product is that the duration of the noise be longer. It is pretty soul-destroying when you’re trying to soothe a baby and the noise goes off. This might have to do with battery life. Great for travel and mechanism can easily be removed when traveling. I will use this with my second child as it has last three years!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Hendrikz

customer_reviews.title: Very good on the go sound machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby girl after having the on the go giraffe for my son. The sleep sheep is noticeably smaller but works just the same. You can choose from 4 different sounds. It doesn't have a white noise setting like the giraffe but the rain sounds very close and is what we use most. You can set the timer for 23 minutes or 45 minutes. There is no continuous option. I don't mind that as I know I'd be replacing the batteries constantly if it was on all night. Overall I do like this on the go sleep sheep. It fits great in my daughters pack n play too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, the knob for sound control stopped working after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for only 3 1/2 months and within the last month it's stopped working. Any time you go to turn the volume knob up, it shuts off before you can even reach the middle range of loudness. It was great when we first had it, but now it's just a waste of money. Tried to replace the batteries thinking that might have been it, nope, still barely even reaches an audible level. Do yourself a favor and find a different portable sound machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kato W

customer_reviews.title: It’s aight
customer_reviews.text: We actually really like the sleep sheep, but we have had a few lemons. First one was great. Second one for second child goes from volume 0 to volume 10 at the slightest turn of the knob (not great). Third one for third child is inconsistent and won’t always turn on. Tends to turn off at higher volume of ocean sounds??? So I’ve just ordered my fourth one to replace the third. This product is great for traveling as well. Velcro is super loud, so plan ahead! With how many I’ve bought, I wish this was priced a bit lower. :(

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this text from our son about our first grand baby - says it all! “Latest too cute for words update: The baby loves her sleep sheep. It's a sheep that plays nature sounds etc we got at baby shower lol she was getting fussy and we put this on and she has been snoozin' ever since”
customer_reviews.author: Karla Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is adorable and works a treat. I absolutely wish I had bought it years ago. My son is age 4 and he now falls asleep within moments. He was a great sleeper and staying asleep wasn't the problem, it just took him a while to fully settle to get to sleep. Now he's fast asleep in no time. He loves it, I love it. He climbs into bed and happily grabs his sheep and picks a sound and away he goes. Love it. I really can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Happymum

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Our month old baby won't sleep at night without this guy. I even find the sounds relaxing and they help me get to sleep. The size is great for the bassinet or stroller. Great purchase and would make an awesome baby shower gift. The only thing I would change is having the heartbeat sound available on this smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Alcina

customer_reviews.title: Sleep sheep dead after 9 months...
customer_reviews.text: We have loved the sleep sheep, it's amazing, soothing, and travels easily. My son loves to cuddle with it during nighttime car rides. However we've only had it for 9 months and it's dead. I've replaced the batteries once a few months ago with no issue, but I just went to replace them again and it's still not turning on. I've tried two pair of new batteries and still nothing. Hopefully this one is just a dud. If give it another a chance since I can't imagine it would last less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDiane

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult to place sound box in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old who struggles to sleep. Its cute and the volume and sounds are great, unfortunately my kiddo is terrified of it lol. he dislikes roaring sounds so maybe the rain and ocean sounds scare him. Oh well. But i struggled to put the sound box in. When i finally figured it out, i pulled the little lamb's tail a bit and some of the material came off. So its a bit fragil. Don't know how many washes it could last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Great! But would like a constant on setting
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. We got the travel size and it’s perfect for those car seat rides or minimal space in the crib. We only use one sound setting and that’s the rainfall setting. It’s the only audio the is consistent in tone. Sounds closer to a static, it does not ebb and flow like some the other sounds available. Only major downfall is that it does not have a constant on setting. The max it will play is 45min.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong almost 9 years later
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preemie. It was in the NICU with her and now, at almost 9, she still uses it to self soothe and meditate. She loves him, we named him Hector. We replace the batteries as necessary, wash him, and strap him back onto anything in her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: the BEST
customer_reviews.text: We have had different animals for all 3 of our children. It was gifted to me (not knowing what it was). what a lifesaver!! Totally recommend for new moms. Travels really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: My son (6 months) loves his "sleepy sheep"at bedtime. It's really a great white noise machine for little ones. My only complaint is that it got a small tear at a seam almost immediatly. I was able to fix it but there wasn't any realy abuseto the toy that should have caused this since my son only snuggles with it and doesn't play with it. ****EDIT**** While my son does still love his sheep, it is starting to fall apart already. Multiple seams are giving and even the soundbox is having problems. I do not plan on replacing it unless he is inconsolible when it finally needs to be throw out. I'm really disapointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: hla110109

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Ours sounds like a lot of static and volume isn't the best so yoy can't make out the sound differences. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the giraffe for my son and was happy to find they still make these. They are very nice and make a great gift. And they honestly work. My son loves his from newborn til the age of 2.
customer_reviews.author: valentine knapp

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping baby is a happy parent
customer_reviews.text: The sleep sheep travel is a better younger brother I would choose this model over another This one has great sounds that babies like So this is one to get, not "maybe" or "I might" Very simple to use, volume control turns on the device, then you have 4 sounds to choose from. There are 4 different sounds to choose from and the sound selection are better (in my opinion) than those of the larger version of this toy. The white noise has been instrumental in helping my baby sleep when they're going crazy or are tired. Very useful and is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Skip this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 month old for her car seat. The sheep is cute but the sound box doesn't fit snuggly in the back pouch. Then when you cram the box in the sheep it is impossible to hear the sounds. I would not recommend this product there is no point in even having it when it is so awful!!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: slleep sheep
customer_reviews.text: the control box was ttoo big to put into the sheep. I returned it but they sent me a new one. It is a gift and I will just give it to t hem without trying my self. I previously ordered the big one and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: patricia wood

customer_reviews.title: A travel must have to drown out noises keeping baby from sleeping
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product two years ago I used it for my newborn baby. He loves the sound of white noise and it helped to get him to sleep and stay asleep. We used it for naps on-the-go as we had a regular sound machine for all night. It attached to the car seat and stroller. Only two of the four sounds my baby preferred, which was fine with me as I found the whale sounds a bit creepy anyhow!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mae

customer_reviews.title: My baby sleeps great with this noise maker
customer_reviews.text: My baby sleeps great with this noise maker. I really only use two of the settings but there are a few to choose from. Also, when we travel and I need to save space, I remove the actual noise maker from the back of the stuffed lamb so that it takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Must for Some Kids
customer_reviews.text: I found the regular Sleep Sheep to be quite big and wanted something more portable, so I was glad to find this travel size one. Don't let it fool you, it's not a tiny version of the big one, it's still a decent size. Our little one seemed to like white noises in the earlier months, so this sheep went with us everywhere. The volume control is great (many baby toys come in mute or super loud only). The two timing options (23 vs. 45 mins) are great as well. I usually just leave it at 45 mins though. The battery lasts quite a long time. We used it everyday for a few months before we had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it and my little one likes it. I do wish it came with a timer longer than 45 min. This is the only reason why I gave it four stars. My little one wakes up almost immediately after it shuts off. There are times he needs an hour nap but won't sleep at all without "white noise" of some sort so this product gives us at least some nap time. The wales are pretty cool and the stream is neat too. Really, the sounds are based on preference but are not obnoxious like some I have encountered. The volume dial is very versatile from soft to loud. Nice product. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Real Mom

customer_reviews.title: GIFT FOR MOM TO BE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter as a Mother's Day gift (Mom to be). She is due in a couple of months. My daughter received the sheep today and called to thank me. She absolutely thinks it is so cute and she likes the sounds. She already attached it to the baby's crib and took a few snap shots and emailed them to me. I'm glad she loved it. Makes me feel good that I found a Mommy to be gift and a new baby gift all rolled into one. If this helps her baby sleep longer, then it is a gift that will give every day of the years to come.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Its smaller than I thought but it works great. I set the timer for 45 minutes and baby falls right too sleep. The whale sound is kind of creepy and my baby hates it. I like the volume controls. Battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The sound box barely fits in the back of the lamb and sometimes stops working when you move it
customer_reviews.author: Wave and Dwayne Milewski

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We liked the full size sheep and wanted one for on the go. It only plays the white noises, no songs, FYI
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Heaton

customer_reviews.title: The first one works just fine but we moved to Africa and wanted a back ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Cloud b Sheep. The first one works just fine but we moved to Africa and wanted a back up, just in case. I am very impressed with the battery life. You can adjust how long it will play, and the volume. The buttons are easy to push and my 9 month old can activate it himself. I leave it in the crib, next to him and he is starting to cuddle it. We travel a lot and this has helped going to bed in different places so much easier. The grandparents said it was a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: PBlackwell

customer_reviews.title: Best baby white noise machine I've ever used , bought 2 of them eventually
customer_reviews.text: Just the best I've seen out there, tried everything from iPhone apps to other white noise machines. The noise picked here are VERY high quality and natural sounding. All 4 put the baby to sleep in a few minutes. I've travel a lot (remove the noise machines from the sheep for travelling light) and it battery life is also the best I've seen. Been a year now and still using the original batteries. In short a perfect (but slight expensive) baby white noise machine.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter for when she stays at my home. She has one in her own home and goes to sleep easier with it than without it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele E. Krokes

customer_reviews.title: For $5 more get the larger Cloud b Sheep!,
customer_reviews.text: I have the larger Cloud b Sheep and thought I needed a travel size sheep for the car or the stroller. Unfortunately, the music box is the same size! So you get a smaller (much smaller) sheep with the same size music box. The result is that you really feel the box. So the smaller sheep is not as cuddly and useful as the full size. Having both the regular size and smaller size, definitely just get the larger! Because it is soft, it really doesn't take up that much more space and the larger size will be so much more cuddly!
customer_reviews.author: Siddhartha

customer_reviews.title: Musical
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a newborn, but realized it is much better for a little older child, like 1 and above
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: The sheep is adorable, but the pocket for the sound box is ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheep is adorable, but the pocket for the sound box is very tight so we don't keep them together anymore. We only ever use the rain sound. The kids like to goof around with the other sounds, but rain is preferred for sleep. I think the whale sound is kinda weird. My preschool age child likes this better than the baby did and keeps it by his headboard. He wishes it had a constant-on option because he is a light sleeper and finds the white noise helps him stay asleep in spite of all the bumps and creaks in the night.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: good product for travel but no heartbeat sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product if your baby likes nature sounds. It is small for travel which is nice although it would seem for as small as it is it would cost quite a bit less than the larger one. It also only has nature sounds and no heart beat sound which I was pretty disappointed with. One could probably buy a white noise machine from homedics for half the price but that would not come with a cute sheep stuffed animal. It does come with a cute birth certificate thing in which you or your child can name the sheep and keep it as a keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: BostonTerrierLuv

customer_reviews.title: Soft, safe, useful and visually appealing
customer_reviews.text: This sleep sheep was an absolute must for the first couple years for my son. He was soothed so well from the white noise this would generate that he could barely fall asleep without it. We would put him to sleep, press his favorite sound (the stream) and it would play for about 45 minutes to be sure he was in a deep sleep. The sheep itself is soft, safe for him, useful and visually appealing as well. This put him to sleep much better than anything else and I am glad we had this
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this product. My daughter does very well sleeping with music and noises and this sound machine helped calm her down during the "witching" hours when she was a newborn. My only reason for not giving this product 5 stars is because the timing is weird. 23 minutes, or 45 minutes. I wish it could go a little longer, up to an hour since that's normally her nap time.
customer_reviews.author: PennyandtheJets

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and the batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It's plenty loud, the timer is handy, and the sounds definitely work on getting my fussy newborn to sleep. Good battery life, too. I've had this on for several hours a day for weeks now on the same set of batteries and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Seventh-777Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small child!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 1 and 1/12 year old niece. I saw a video of her opening it, and she immediately hugged and kissed the sheep and waved it around for everyone to see. It appears to be just the right sized stuffed animal for a 1-2 year old child to hold and cuddle with. She also really likes the noise box that fits inside the stuffed animal. Not only is it a "bonus toy" with all sorts of buttons to push, it has 4 different sound settings- she prefers the whales.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It was okay.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it overall. I didn't care for the way you have to insert the sound machine inside the sheep with some of it exposed. Feel they should come up with a different way. I also didn't care for the Velcro used to attach to different things ...seems too long to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great New Baby Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift. First time baby for a good friend. I remember trying to keep the house silent while my first baby slept! What a mistake! I kept a radio on for my second! But this is a sweet calming lamb. The sounds are similar to what a newborn would be accustomed to in the womb. Well, not quite...gentle whale songs and nature sounds are similar and soothing. I bet it will work like a charm on a fussy newborn baby.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot Nanny

customer_reviews.title: So soft and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday and was so pleased with the quality and size. I think it will be perfect for the busy mom on the go. I purchased it for a baby shower I am attending later this month and I can't wait to see her reaction to it. This little lamb is so soft and cute and the added white noise machine is perfect! I wish they had these when my kids were babies!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Daycare
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my son when he started daycare. He sleeps with a sound machine at home, so when we transitioned to daycare, I knew he would nap better if he had some white noise in the background. It attaches easily to his crib at daycare and he is napping great. Perfect volume and variety of sounds to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: M. LeighTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: LO loves to
customer_reviews.text: Wish it stayed on longer than 45 minutes. As soon as it turns off our LO wakes up. We also have a sound knob that’s defective. We have to turn it to max volume the turn it back a little to get it to be on max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I got this as a shower gift. I had heard mixed reviews, but it works incredibly for my son! I even bought a second one as a back up, just in case, but for the past year this has been a lifesaver and has worked perfectly. I highly recommend it to any new mothers. Whenever my son would get fussy outside of the normal schedule, you press the bottom sleep button, which has whale sounds, and he is out again within minutes. It did take a little bit of time for us to get used to the noise on the monitor, but hang in there, it's worth it. Works like a dream! A+++
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soothing sounds for baby
customer_reviews.text: We got this "on the go" version after having the full-sized model for a year. As much as I loved the original, I love this one even more and wish we had just gotten it to begin with. As advertised, it's much more portable. I like the size and that it has a velcro strap. It is just as loud and carries just as much bang as the larger model.
customer_reviews.author: MidtownMama

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only two months
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this item while it worked. My son sleeps and calms so much better with a sound machine. We had been using our phones during car rides but Themis was so much (and saved our data). However, after only two months it no longer works. I thought the issue might be the battery, but I just switched them and it still doesn’t work. Really sad not to be able to use this anymore since it was such a godsend when we first purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the standard sleep sheep this is great for daily use and travel. You can get about 9 months out of a battery with twice daily use. The sounds are soothing, and the volume is adjustable for each kid in different situations. Also, the choice of 25 min or 45 min makes for a nice feature if your kiddo isn't that tired. We bought another for our newborn after using one multiple times daily over the past 2 years with our older son.
customer_reviews.author: BrookeTrout

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loooooooves this sheep! We only use the "rain" sound, so I can't comment on any of the others, but this is a definite MUST HAVE. The second I turn this one she is out like a light, if she fusses in the middle of the night I just turn it back on and she goes right back to sleep. It also works great for naps during the day. I have it hanging on her crib and she usually likes to snuggle as close as possible to it and put her hand on it, it's adorable. You will not regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Lamb of God....
customer_reviews.text: Sweetest little lamb. It works, the sounds are soothing and I love that it is small enough to take with you anywhere. And it came with batteries installed. Thats a real plus. It is all ready to wrap and give as a gift. I dont recommend that you let your small child sleep with it or hold it as it's not really meant for cuddling but rather for it's soothing sounds. And so sweet to look at. A little pricey but worth it for any parent who wants to help their child be comfortable and soothed.
customer_reviews.author: DLO

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the full sized Sleep Sheep!
customer_reviews.text: This mini Sleep Sheep is just darling! I bought it for my daughter so she would have one like her brother's but I liked the idea of a smaller one so it would take up less room in the crib than the original one had. It is really cute. I like the sounds on it a lot better too. No more heartbeat sound, it has been replaced by a babbling brook which I prefer so much better since the heart on the full model never sounded quite right in my opinion. The timed modes are great (up to 45 minutes) so that you do not waste batteries.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have a sleep sheep and it plays ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have a sleep sheep and it plays music as well as sounds. This one only plays sounds. I thought this was the same one considering the musical notes all over the packaging. Don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Newyorkbuyer

customer_reviews.title: A must for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd sleep sheep we’ve purchased. I used this one, and the larger version with my first daughter 7 years ago. Bought another for our new baby. Great sounds/volume. Easy to travel. Great for pack n plays.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great baby gift, people will thank you again and again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, since the one bought for us has proven indispensable. It's now our go-to baby gift when any friend is expecting. Our son loves it, as it creates just the perfect amount of noise to drift off to sleep. Even at 3, he loves having it around for bed time - a must have! The only downside is that the sheep makes some crazy sounds when batteries start running low - nothing terrible or ear piercing, just odd.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sound machine with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: We love this sleep sheep as it is a great way to help our second child tune out the noise of our first child. It is a great size, and the controls are easy and effective. The only major flaw we have found is that when the time is up, the sound just shuts off abruptly which sometimes wakes up our daughter. It would be so much better, in my opinion, if they would make it so that when the sound ends, it fades out instead of just stopping. Overall, a great product and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: hospital bag must
customer_reviews.text: We loved sleep sheep do much w first two babies that we just HAD to buy another when we misplaced the third time headed to hospital. Even toddlers still love it bc soft and cute.
customer_reviews.author: GA Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A nice sleep aid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my newborn son and it helped me out on those cranky nights when he just couldn't get to sleep. When I first read about the product I was a little confused on how the song of a whale could help my child sleep, but it grabs his attention even if he's crying and calms him down. I love the fact that it plays for 45 minutes and the various noises. We love this product so much that I purchased one for my friend who is about to have a baby. In addition to the sounds, my son just loves to play with the sheep.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: The sheep is very soft, cute, and portable. Most of the sounds were good, while it lasted. We went through two of these in a span of four months and I decided that was enough. It was set to the longer time setting at night, and every day for two naps. It didn't play continuously, just until the timer was up, so I expected it to last longer than it did. Maybe my expectations are too high but for the price I expected to get more use out of it than we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi J.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be my favorite for my three month old granddaughter but I found others that we love more. This is okay and the one good thing is that you can Velcro this to a carriage or carrier..that is something the others did not have. I was disappointed that it only has a few sounds and they are not that great. Wish it had talked or said more, played songs or something also. It is more expensive then others and I don't think worth it.
customer_reviews.author: angel girl

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the beginning, now 6 months in it shuts off after a couple minutes. So we either have to keep going into the room to turn it back on or let our little one scream himself to sleep. Not reliable, put your money towards something else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley King

customer_reviews.title: Baby boy has started sleeping longer with the sheep and I love the different options of sounds
customer_reviews.text: The sleep sheep has been a total game changer. Baby boy has started sleeping longer with the sheep and I love the different options of sounds. There are two timer options which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: We love the sleep sheep! We had one with our first born and ordered this one for our 2nd baby. It is a must have on my list! My first slept through everything when this was on no matter where we were! Very calming to every baby I have been it around! All my friends love it for there baby's too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and wouldn't want to be without it
customer_reviews.text: We've used this every nap, every bed time for the past 11 months! Thank you Cloud B for putting my baby to sleep every night!! I love this product and wouldn't want to be without it!! The 45 minute timer is wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: MB Simmons

customer_reviews.title: the sound machine
customer_reviews.text: the sound machine is very good. the cloud sheep is not well made. it was to small to insert the sound machine inside and it looks that the one I got is defective
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little 6 month old grandaughter, and within a few days she was settling down in her crib, listening to the soothing sounds, and watching it while she fell asleep to it. It attaches onto the crib rail with a velcro strap. The fabric lamb is very soft nice quaility. It has a timer, and a volume control. The only negative, and it's not that bad, is that the whale sounds are a little scary, but the other 3 sounds are very nice and natural. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used the lamb noise machine for two kids so far and they still (at 4 and 2) want to use it for bedtime. We bought this one for our third child. They are easy to travel with and help kids fall asleep in new rooms or locations.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Love these- used for my girls and now buy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these- used for my girls and now buy for all babyshowers! Great for traveling and sleeping in new places with different sounds. It's a consistent sound that blocks out other noises. Or if you're having friends over etc. and your house is loud, it soothes and cancels out the other clatter!
customer_reviews.author: AKmom

customer_reviews.title: Great little sheep
customer_reviews.text: I adore this sheep and the idea of it being attachable to a stroller or car seat handle. However, the music box I got was defective and would spot playing after a short while. Sad I had to return it but I bought a new one at the store instead.
customer_reviews.author: lsmky

customer_reviews.title: Cute sheep with lovely sound; minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Sounds are lovely and a nice volume. Though I’m not sure there’s a baby out there interested in random, semi-piercing whale sounds but to each their own! The sheep is soft and a good size. Definitely not a fun plush toy for the wee ones as the sound box pokes out the back and is held by just a bit of Velcro. Also wish they’d made it something you could tie or buckle bc as soon as you have to adjust the Velcro that loud rip will probably disturb baby. Great as an on the go solution for fussy babies and super precious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize that this was the travel size and only ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that this was the travel size and only included 4 sounds, no music... my kids ripped the packaging so now I'm stuck with it. It's the same price as the regular sheep, skip this version and get the full one.
customer_reviews.author: MN mom

customer_reviews.title: Infants love it
customer_reviews.text: We gave it as a gift for a newborn and the baby and parents love it.
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: 39 and I love my Sleep Sheep!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw my friend attach her Sleep Sheep On the Go to her daughter's bassinet, I knew I had to have one. 2 months later I still rave about the purchase. CD's and my iPod are great, but Sleep Sheep really works on those nights or mornings when I'm having trouble getting restful sleep. Without having to get out of bed, I simply press the rain sounds button--my favorite setting--and inevitably I fall back asleep. I enjoy it so much, my 11-year-old son wants one! This is an excellent product for babies, kids and us not so kids anymore!
customer_reviews.author: BeachBum

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Sheep is the tits!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this. Great for strapping to the infant seat on car rides, the outside of the bassinet for living room naps and taking to the grandparents house. The "gurgling stream" sound is the clearest/most soothing to us, "rain" sounds like higher-pitched white noise, "ocean" sounds like freeway traffic and the whale sounds are on too short a loop (gets repetitive). So overall, could use improvement on the sound quality but this is a great soother and the rigid audio unit is removable so sleep sheep can be cuddled at a later stage.
customer_reviews.author: sleebs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and as soon as we turned it on the first time he was calmed... he started sleeping all night a lot sooner then we expected. Now my son has taken it to his home and I'm left ordering another for my house. He stays with me during the day and our house is so full of noise that I can't get him to sleep longer then 15 minutes at a time without his sleep sheep! It is worth every cent! I can't wait for it to arrive I'm counting the minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleep routine
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old son loves this sleep sheep. As soon as he hears the ocean's waves, he knows it's naptime and drifts off to sleep. It's great to use to create a routined sleep schedule. I also use this sheep in his car seat when we leave. It really relaxes him. At night we use the Cloud B Lady Bug Consellation Night Light. As soon as he sees the stars, he knows it's bedtime and he falls to sleep with no fuss. Between the two Cloud B products, we have a well rested baby. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Peanut Butter and Jelly Maker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this little sheep really DOES work!!! My 6 week old baby loves listening to the ocean sound at full volume. It helps her fall asleep faster and stay asleep better. This is so worth giving it a try. If it works for your baby, you'll thank your lucky stars you found this product. I'd highly recommend it. Its also VERY adorable and the velcro straps allow you to attach this to practically anything your baby is in. I'm in love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby =  happy momma
customer_reviews.text: This is my second sleep sheep, this time for baby #2 because baby #1 (21 months) is unwilling to surrender his! Perfect for white noise for baby and baby #1 likes to play with the different sounds when I put him down for bed/naps until he finds the sound he wants. A great purchase the first time and I have no reason to suspect anything different this time!
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Anders

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Baby Gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received a sleep sheep when she was born in 2010 and we are still using it! I like the size of the travel sleep sheep and even use it myself when I'm having trouble drifting off! I now give this gift to every new baby I know. No distracting lights or "canned" music, just calm, soothing sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 mo old sleeps with this next to his crib every night. He seems to like having it. I default to the rain sound effect. The noise/motion feature has been a little annoying though. I don't think it's ever turned on to "soothe" him. But it does turn on every time I close the closet door or after a loud clap of thunder. :/ It is loud enough for his room but not for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Skrow

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to playing
customer_reviews.text: Very cute doll! I love it! Wish my baby will love too: )
customer_reviews.author: stacyjin

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to order the larger size one and didn't realize that I had ordered the smaller one. I was glad because it is the perfect size for my baby. I can attach it to her carseat, crib, or anywhere. I didn't like the fact that there were whale songs instead of heartbeat but my baby loves the whale songs and that is what see uses to fall asleep. It really calms her we take it everywhere with us. I don't know what we would do if I forgot it anywhere. I am so happy with it and plan on buying the larger one and the lavendar lab too.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Landry

customer_reviews.title: OK  sounds could be better
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this in a beat up kind of fashion. Looked as though it was thrown into the box. Never did receive the book that was supposed to come with it. It has a sound of whales on it. Although I don't mind it ...my son said "try having it on while the baby is sleeping in your room"....annoying ...LOL...oh well. Rainfall is OK but could have done other sounds more soothing to a person.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: thank goodness for backround noise
customer_reviews.text: my son is a good sleeper but I feel like his sleep sheep takes his zzzs to the next level, I keep a big one in his crib and take this one to other spots he sleeps at home and with us any time we go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plush lamb sound machine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound machine for stroller, crib, car seat great to travel with. This is my second purchase for my 2 younger grandchildren. Fast delivery. Soft lamb I recommend this sound machine for home and travel
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Soft & Cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be for my great-nephew for his first birthday. I think he will really love it, as it plays soft sounds that just might get him to sleep better. Extremely soft and cuddly too, like cotton balls soft. Even the ears are soft. Highly recommend this with or without the soothing sounds, it's that cuddly!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wise

product_meta.title: Cloud b Sleep Sheep On The Go Travel Sound Soother
product_meta.description:
Color:Sleep Sheep on the GoA compact version of the award winning original Sleep Sheep, this adorable travel companion brings its comforting sleep time sounds with you when you are away from home. Similar to the original Sleep Sheep, the On The Go version has four soothing sounds to help your child sleep easier; however its convenient size (8" tall) fits easily in a diaper bag or luggage. On The Go is especially helpful in calming children to sleep in an unfamiliar environment.

AMAZON.COM
Soothe your child into a restful, relaxing nap or night of sleep with the Sleep Sheep from Cloud b. This soft, adorable and compact sleep time pal plays calming sounds and is great for home or on-the-go use--anywhere baby needs a little extra help drifting into dreams. 

 

Four Soothing Nature Sounds
Winner of several industry awards, including the National Parenting Council's Seal of Approval and the iParenting Media Award, the Sleep Sheep is plush and very cuddly, so it immediately gives a restless child something pleasing and calming to hold on to. It also creates a tranquil environment with four soothing nature sounds, including gentle stream, spring showers, ocean waves and harmonious whale sounds, making the Sleep Sheep a kind of audio pacifier that helps take some of the stress and crankiness out of rest time. Great For On-the-Go Parents
The Sleep Sheep is specially designed to be easy to take with you on outdoor excursions or car trips. It comes with a Velcro strap that allows for fast and simple attachment to car seats and strollers. As you drive or push baby through the grocery store, he'll be able to take a breather. And because he's relaxed, you can focus on task at hand, which makes running errands more productive.

User-Friendly Operation
The Sleep Sheep features user-friendly operation that both big and little hands can handle. Select sounds by simply pressing the push button, and then choose the most comfortable volume. For added convenience and to save battery power, the sounds automatically time out after either 23 or 45 minutes--giving your little one plenty of time to drift off to dreamland.

Compact and portable, the Sleep Sheep stands eight inches tall and takes two "AA" batteries (included). The sound box removes if your child simply wants to use the Sleep Sheep as a stuffed toy, and clean-up is a snap--just wipe the surface with soap and water.

About Cloud b
Cloud b, the baby sleep specialist, was established by two new mothers with the philosophy that every baby deserves a sound night's sleep for healthy development. That's why all of Cloud b's products are developed in consultation with an advisory board of pediatricians and sleep specialists with a single focus: to achieve a better, safer sleep for baby.

What's in the Box
One Sleep Sheep and two "AA" batteries.

The On-the-Go Sleep Sheep offers:  * Cuddly plush toy that provides soothing sounds. 
 * Built-in Velcro strap for easy attachment to strollers and car seats. 
 * Timer shuts off the sound after either 23 or 45 minutes. 



Shown together with larger Sleep Sheep.





BRAND STORY
By Cloud B

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A compact version of the award-winning original Sleep Sheep, this adorable travel companion brings its comforting sleep time sounds with you when you are away from home. Similar to the original Sleep Sheep, the On The Go version has four soothing sounds to help your child sleep easier; however its convenient size (8" tall) fits easily in a diaper bag or luggage. On The Go is especially helpful in calming children to sleep in an unfamiliar environment.

See more
feature_bullets: WHITE NOISE: Four soothing sound options including gentle stream, spring showers, ocean surf and whale songs.
PORTABLE: Travel size easily fits in diaper bag or carry on luggage.
EASY: Hook and Loop Fastener For Attachment To Baby’s Crib, Strollers Or Car Seat
ADJUSTABLE VOLUME: For the perfect sound setting.
AUTO SHUT OFF: Two sleep timer options 23 and 45 minutes
